1274960.name: Game Overlay Pro
1274960.description:
Game Overlay Pro is a software that lets you add custom made or premade overlays to any Directx game.

Create your own overlays using texts,images,videos,web pages. These items are fully configurable and lets you design custom overlays.
Use fps overlays and track the game performance.
Use overlays like clock,timer and other useful utilities.

Game Overlay Pro gives you simple solutions for several problems...
If you want to watch a video while you are playing a fullscreen game, you can't keep the video on top. Game Overlay Pro lets you embed the video to games.
If you are a streamer and don't have multiple screens, you can also embed the chat and keep an eye for the chat.
